patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,31 +0,0 @@
-package main
-
-import (
-    "context"
-    "github.com/gin-gonic/gin"
-    "control-panel/adapters/drivers"
-    "control-panel/adapters/drivens"
-    "control-panel/ports/drivers"
-    "control-panel/ports/drivens"
-    "control-panel/models"
-    "control-panel/handler"
-)
-
-var drivenAdapter drivens.DrivenAdapterPort = drivens.NewDrivenAdapter()
-var controlPanelAdapter drivers.ControlPanelPort = drivers.NewControlPanelAdapter(drivenAdapter)
-
-func ExampleEndpoint(c *gin.Context) {
-    var input models.ExampleModel
-    if err := c.BindJSON(&input); err != nil {
-        handler.HandleError(c, err)
-        return
-    }
-
-    result, err := controlPanelAdapter.ExampleFunction(context.Background(), input.Data)
-    if err != nil {
-        handler.HandleError(c, err)
-        return
-    }
-
-    c.JSON(http.StatusOK, gin.H{"result": result})
-}
\ No newline at end of file
